data.name: Mage Rumble
data.detailed_description:
Battle for victory by casting a variety of spells on your opponents each turn until there's only one mage standing. Purchase new spells between rounds using gold you've earned during the fight. Every game is different, with randomly-positioned mages, randomly-generated terrain and different spells to choose from (some of which are affected by wind). Play by yourself, with others online and computer opponents in teams or free-for-all.

Customize Your Game
  • Play with 2 to 24 mages with any combination of players and computers
  • Set your team settings: number of teams and number of mages on each team or deathmatch (free-for-all)
  • Select each computer's skill, from random to accurate
  • Adjust wind settings from calm to strong
  • Choose the total number of rounds, maximum turns in each round and the length of each turn

data.short_description: Battle by yourself or with friends against the computer and other players in this turn-based combat game! Learn new spells after each round (if you can afford them) to add to your arsenal. Choose your game mode, customize your preferences and may the best mage win!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
